item.endrem.old_eye.description: §7§oThis eye remembers harsh sunlight, and is still warm to the touch
item.endrem.rogue_eye.description: §7§oThis eye peeks through the leaves and whispers in an unknown tongue
item.endrem.nether_eye.description: §7§oThis eye watches fire dance around it
item.endrem.magical_eye.description: §7§oThis eye studies ancient tomes from inside its masters study
item.endrem.black_eye.description: §7§oThis eye watched the sky disappear behind shovelfuls of sand
item.endrem.lost_eye.description: §7§oIt gravitates to places that have long since been abandoned
item.endrem.wither_eye.description: §7§oThis eye peers through its minions, hungry to see their victims flesh wither
item.endrem.cursed_eye.description: §7§oA powerful yet destructive artifact; the Piglins swore to protect it at the cost of their lives
item.endrem.exotic_eye.description: §7§oThose who followed this eye were never seen again; rumors say they found the great city of Atlantis, or lost their way trying
item.endrem.evil_eye.description: §7§oA holy talisman said to protect its owner from bad luck
item.endrem.undead_eye.description: §7§oThis eye has seen ages pass around it, as its body remained preserved
item.endrem.cryptic_eye.description: §7§o§kThis eye went weeweewee, all the way home!
item.endrem.corrupted_eye.description: §7§oThis eye has watched its civilization fall to spreading corruption
item.endrem.witch_eye.description: §7§oThis eye has brewed vile potions that were lost to time
block.endrem.ender_eye.throw_warning: This eye doesn't know where to go
block.endrem.ender_eye.use_warning: This eye doesn't want to be used
block.endrem.custom_eye.place: This eye is can't be placed
block.endrem.custom_eye.frame_has_eye: This frame already has an eye
block.endrem.custom_eye.broken: This portal is not built properly
